TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPointCustomProperties extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 定義資料點、數列和空點通用的自訂屬性。

span.span: Defines custom properties that are common to data points, series and empty points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會定義自訂屬性，例如色彩、 所用的背景影像、 影線，等等。This class defines custom properties such as colors, the use of background images, hatching, and so forth. 類別，類別和屬性衍生自這個類別。The class, class and the property are all derived from this class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The series that the data point belongs to.

param.name: pointProperties
param.span: 旗標，表示此屬性是否為資料點自訂屬性。

span.span: A flag that indicates whether this is a data point custom property.

summary.span: 使用指定的數列和自訂屬性旗標，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified series and custom properties flag.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料點、數列或空點之 X 軸標籤的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the X-axis label for the data point, series or an empty point.

summary.span: 這個屬性只有在尚未針對相關的 物件指定自訂標籤時才能使用。

span.span: This property is only used if a custom label has not been specified for the relevant object.

value.span: 值，表示 X 軸標籤的文字。

span.span: A value that represents the text of the X-axis label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會設定數列或空點的資料點的軸標籤。This property sets the axis label for a data point, series or an empty point. 這個屬性只能設定在執行階段為物件。This property can only be set at run time for a object. 如果您設定此屬性，或是物件，其資料點的所有將使用此標籤。If you set this property or a object, all of its data points will use this label. 如果屬性未設定和自訂標籤未指定，會產生軸標籤自動使用軸刻度。If the property is not set and a custom label has not been specified, an axis label will be generated automatically using the axis scale. 使用設定空點標籤屬性。Empty point labels are set using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`clearAll`參數設為`true`、 清除所有先前的屬性值，否則它們不。If the `clearAll` parameter is set to `true`, all previous property values are cleared, otherwise they are not.
